rationale: The 'Unnamed: 0' column represents months, and 'Smartphone X1' indicates the number of units sold. A bar chart effectively displays the total sales per month, allowing for easy comparison of performance across different months.

The 'Smartphone X1.1' column contains the dollar amount sold, while 'Unnamed: 0' represents the months. A line chart is suitable for showing revenue trends over time, helping to identify peak sales periods.

By aggregating sales data from different product categories (Smartphone X1, Laptop Pro 15, Wireless Earbuds Z), this grouped bar chart will effectively show how each product performs in terms of sales, facilitating easy comparison across categories.
